treatment-md.title: Neoechinorhynchus golvani Salgado-Maldonado 1978
treatment-md.article-title: Redescription of Neoechinorhynchus (Neoechinorhynchus) golvani Salgado-Maldonado, 1978 (Acanthocephala: Neoechinorhynchidae) and description of a new species from freshwater cichlids (Teleostei: Cichlidae) in Mexico
